frozen_definition.name: MemoMood
frozen_definition.signal_source: Digital content organization shows users can't find specific content when needed, especially contextual/emotional content
frozen_definition.description: Emotion-based memory organizer that saves content (memes, quotes, photos) tagged by how they made you feel for easy retrieval
frozen_definition.target_user: People who save inspiring content but struggle to find the right piece when they need emotional support or motivation
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Users report difficulty finding specific saved content when needed for particular emotional contexts
core_loop: Search for content by emotional need
frozen_definition.differentiation: Emotion-first organization vs. topic-based filing, focus on psychological utility of saved content
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited saves, advanced emotion categorization, and mood analytics

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for 50 items, premium for unlimited and advanced mood features
